[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos/src/move_tool/coverage.rs] [Function: compile_coverage()] [Directory Traversal in install_dir] Can the install_dir field from move_options.output_dir at line 177 be manipulated to write compilation artifacts to arbitrary system directories through '../' path traversal, potentially overwriting critical system files or planting malicious code in privileged locations?
